Interface Potential

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PotCHARMM

    public interface Potential
    Potential energy function of the system
    Since:
    Sindo 3.6
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getEnergy(AtomMD[] atoms)
      Returns the energy of the system for a given coordinates
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getEnergyComponent()
      Returns the energy by component

      Returns the gradient of the system for a given coordinates
      void setQMatoms(int[] qmatoms)
      Sets the QM atoms to the Potential and remove unnecessary ff terms.

    • Method Detail

      • getEnergy

        double getEnergy(AtomMD[] atoms)
        Returns the energy of the system for a given coordinates
        Parameters:
        atoms - [Natom] the atoms of the system
        Returns:
        the energy (Hartree)

      • getEnergyComponent

        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> getEnergyComponent()
        Returns the energy by component
        Returns:
        the energies with the name of component set to the keys

      • getGradient

        double[][] getGradient(AtomMD[] atoms)
        Returns the gradient of the system for a given coordinates
        Parameters:
        atoms - [Natom] the atoms of the system
        Returns:
        the gradient [Natom][3] (Hartree/bohr)

      • setQMatoms

        void setQMatoms(int[] qmatoms)
        Sets the QM atoms to the Potential and remove unnecessary ff terms.
        Parameters:
        qmatoms - The index of QM atoms
